targets.query:
from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["domain", "entity_id"])
  |> yield(name: "{{domain}}/{{entity_id}}")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> yield(name: "{{entity_id}}")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "attr_friendly_name")
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id", "domain", "_value"])
  |> count()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 30)
